001package imagingbook.common.util;
002
003import java.awt.Shape;
004import java.awt.geom.Line2D;
005import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
006import java.awt.geom.PathIterator;
007import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
008import java.util.Arrays;
009
010import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
012
013@Deprecated
014public class ShapeUtils {
015
016        public static double distance(Pnt2d pnt, Shape s, double flatness) {
017                Point2D p = pnt.toAwtPoint2D();
018                
019                if (s.contains(p)) {
020                        return 0;
021                }
022                
023                final PathIterator pi = s.getPathIterator(null, flatness);
024                final Line2D line = new Line2D.Double();
025                double bestDistSq = Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
026                double firstX = Double.NaN;
027                double firstY = Double.NaN;
028                double lastX = Double.NaN;
029                double lastY = Double.NaN;
030                final double coords[] = new double[6];
031                while (!pi.isDone()) {
032                        final boolean validLine;
033                        switch (pi.currentSegment(coords)) {
034                        case PathIterator.SEG_MOVETO:
035                                lastX = coords[0];/* from ww w . j a va2s.co m */
036                                lastY = coords[1];
037                                firstX = lastX;
038                                firstY = lastY;
039                                validLine = false;
040                                break;
041                        case PathIterator.SEG_LINETO: {
042                                final double x = coords[0];
043                                final double y = coords[1];
044                                line.setLine(lastX, lastY, x, y);
045                                lastX = x;
046                                lastY = y;
047                                validLine = true;
048                                break;
049                        }
050                        case PathIterator.SEG_CLOSE:
051                                line.setLine(lastX, lastY, firstX, firstY);
052                                validLine = true;
053                                break;
054                        default:
055                                throw new AssertionError();
056                        }
057                        if (validLine) {
058                                final double distSq = line.ptSegDistSq(p);
059                                if (distSq < bestDistSq) {
060                                        bestDistSq = distSq;
061                                }
062                        }
063                        pi.next();
064                }
065                return Math.sqrt(bestDistSq);
066        }
067        
068        
069        static void listPoints(Shape s) {
070                double flatness = 1;
071                final PathIterator pi = s.getPathIterator(null, flatness);
072                final Line2D line = new Line2D.Double();
073                double firstX = Double.NaN;
074                double firstY = Double.NaN;
075                double lastX = Double.NaN;
076                double lastY = Double.NaN;
077                final double coords[] = new double[6];
078                while (!pi.isDone()) {
079                        switch (pi.currentSegment(coords)) {
080                        case PathIterator.SEG_MOVETO:
081                                System.out.println("SEG_MOVETO " + Arrays.toString(coords));
082                                lastX = coords[0];/* from ww w . j a va2s.co m */
083                                lastY = coords[1];
084                                firstX = lastX;
085                                firstY = lastY;
086                                break;
087                        case PathIterator.SEG_LINETO: {
088                                System.out.println("SEG_LINETO " + Arrays.toString(coords));
089                                final double x = coords[0];
090                                final double y = coords[1];
091                                line.setLine(lastX, lastY, x, y);
092                                lastX = x;
093                                lastY = y;
094                                break;
095                        }
096                        case PathIterator.SEG_CLOSE:
097                                System.out.println("SEG_MOVETO " + Arrays.toString(coords));
098                                line.setLine(lastX, lastY, firstX, firstY);
099                                break;
100                        default:
101                                throw new AssertionError();
102                        }
103//                      if (validLine) {
104//                              final double distSq = line.ptSegDistSq(p);
105//                              if (distSq < bestDistSq) {
106//                                      bestDistSq = distSq;
107//                              }
108//                      }
109                        pi.next();
110                }
111        }
112        
113        private static Shape makeLineShape(Point2D p1, Point2D p2) {
114                double x1 = p1.getX();
115                double y1 = p1.getY();
116                double x2 = p2.getX();
117                double y2 = p2.getY();
118                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
119                path.moveTo(x1, y1);
120                path.lineTo(x2, y2);
121                return path;
122        }
123        
124        public static void main(String[] args) {
125                Point2D p1 = new Point2D.Double(0, 0);
126                Point2D p2 = new Point2D.Double(200, 500);
127                
128                Shape line = makeLineShape(p1, p2);
129                System.out.println("line = " + line);
130                
131//              System.out.println("contains 1 = " + line.contains(p1));
132//              System.out.println("contains 2 = " + line.contains(p2));
133                
134                listPoints(line);
135                
136                GeometricCircle gc = new GeometricCircle(20, 30, 100);
137                Shape circle = gc.getShape();
138                System.out.println("circle = " + circle);
139                listPoints(circle);
140                
141        }
142
143}
